LanguageData.GI_Powerarmour.label: Cyclops Armour
LanguageData.GI_Powerarmour.description: An oversized powered armour designed for Giants. Cyclops armour will make a Giant into a colossal war machine. It is equipped with thrusters and temperature adjustment system.
LanguageData.GI_Powerhelmet.label: Cyclops Helmet
LanguageData.GI_Powerhelmet.description: An oversized powered helmet, capable of protecting the user from toxin.
